home.welcomeMsg:
Organizing book clubs
has never been this easy

about.introduction:
Hi, my name is Daniel.

This website started out as a hobby to organize a book club I used to host. Eventually it turned into a school project that I did together with three other KTH students. Now we are only two left working on it.

If you want to contribute to the website or have any questions, feel free to reach out to us at {account}{'@'}{domain}

findClub.header: Find the club just for you
findClub.description:
Want to read a specific genre in a specific language?
Want to discuss books with your club online or offline?
Search for clubs according to your preferences.

readingList.description:
Add the next-to-read book proposals to the Reading List.
The Reading List is managed by all club members.
Book search is powered by Google Books.

synopsisAndProgress.description:
Select a book from the Reading List to view its synopsis.
Found something interesting? Vote for it!
Track your reading progress of the book that wins.

voteResults.description:
The club owner sets a voting deadline.
When the deadline is due, the votes are calculated.
The book with most votes will be read by the club.
